
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/youxuyang/p/18884806" title="发布于 2025-05-19 20:01">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">vSphere 7.0升级至8.0-vCenter 升级</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p class="" data-start="47" data-end="163"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">近期，vSphere 即将发布新的正式版本，同时 <strong data-start="72" data-end="87">vSphere 7.0</strong> 也将于 <strong data-start="92" data-end="111">2025 年 10 月 2 日</strong>正式结束生命周期（EOS）。届时，<strong data-start="128" data-end="162">博通（Broadcom）将不再为该版本提供技术支持和更新服务</strong>。</span></p>
<p class="" data-start="165" data-end="218"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">为了确保环境的稳定性与安全性，建议尽快完成 vCenter 升级。以下是详细的 vCenter 升级步骤：</span></p>
<h3 class="" data-start="40" data-end="61"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">vCenter 升级前的先决条件：</span></h3>
<ol data-start="63" data-end="297">
<li class="" data-start="63" data-end="126">
<p class="" data-start="66" data-end="126"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong data-start="66" data-end="80">准备临时 IP 地址</strong>：需在与源 vCenter 相同的网络段中预留一个临时 IP，用于升级过程中部署新实例。</span></p>
</li>
<li class="" data-start="127" data-end="193">
<p class="" data-start="130" data-end="193"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong data-start="130" data-end="141">网络连通性要求</strong>：临时 vCenter 实例需能通过端口 <strong data-start="162" data-end="174">443 和 22</strong> 与源 vCenter 进行通信。</span></p>
</li>
<li class="" data-start="194" data-end="238">
<p class="" data-start="197" data-end="238"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong data-start="197" data-end="207">磁盘空间检查</strong>：确保源设备具有足够的可用磁盘空间，以存放升级所需的数据。</span></p>
</li>
<li class="" data-start="239" data-end="297">
<p class="" data-start="242" data-end="297"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong data-start="242" data-end="250">备份保护</strong>：建议在升级前创建 vCenter 的映像级备份（如快照），以便在升级失败时能够快速回滚恢复。</span></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p style="text-align: left" data-start="242" data-end="297"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong>升级目标版本：</strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align: left" data-start="242" data-end="297"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;8.0U3d 百度网盘: <span style="color: rgba(224, 62, 45, 1)">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1tSPqnG8MYB-mIJx6yNgieg 提取码: xcme</span></span><span style="color: rgba(224, 62, 45, 1)">&nbsp;</span><br><strong>升级步骤：</strong></p>
<p style="text-align: left" data-start="242" data-end="297">1、下载vCenter Server 目标版本ISO文件</p>
<ul id="GUID-913F49FC-E0F4-4AEE-8848-A0FE34F05E1D-en_ul_F071AF2EED0C4D568FE0E3DE96AAEE1B" class="ul"></ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184213819-815853396.png"></span></p>
<p>2、打开运行“installer.exe”</p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184227431-981955909.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">3、点击“升级”</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184236909-1336901562.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">4、点击“下一步”</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184244997-1325401487.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">5、勾选协议条款</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184251774-703541987.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">6、连接至源vCenter</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184301553-133253927.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">7、输入源vCenter 用户名和密码，输入源管理ESXI的用户名和密码</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184308538-1225365430.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">8、证书告警点“是”</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184315298-1752667807.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">9、填写部署的目标设备信息（可以是ESXI主机或者vCneter）</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184321620-435440600.png"></span></p>
<p>10、忽略证书告警</p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184327317-1320095715.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">11、选择部署的文件夹</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184332771-1457723503.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">12、选择部署的计算资源</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184342581-1177251728.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">13、填写部署的vCenter虚拟机名称和root密码</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184350985-1237667462.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">14、选择部署类型（8.0要比7.0部署所需的空间大）</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184356979-1738735728.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">15、选择部署的数据存储</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184404783-756331404.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">16、配置网络信息（IP地址为临时IP，升级结束后会使用源vCenter IP）</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184411174-1909605308.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">17、启动部署</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519193910042-34487781.png">、</p>
<p>18、等待第一阶段部署完后，点击“继续”</p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184424752-2093487654.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">19、开始第二阶段部署</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519194118900-1840472504.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">20、连接至源vCenter 进行升级检查</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184431176-1043790290.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">21、查看检查结果（若出现红色告警需要解决后再次运行检查，直至检查通过才能进入到下一步）</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184437695-595612272.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">22、选择升级数据</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184443404-965913885.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">23、配置CEIP</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184448617-179325668.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">24、备份数据后点击“完成”</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184455666-460988445.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">25、点击“确认”</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184501596-12323656.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">26、等待升级后，查看升级后的状态</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184507647-1921906462.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">27、查看升级后的版本</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184515262-709684346.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3617593/202505/3617593-20250519184523371-1899702939.png"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">vCenter 升级完成后，下面就是升级ESXI了，等待集群内的所有ESXI都升级完成后升级分布式交换机。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">至此vCenter 升级结束。</span></p>
